events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position with a detailed resume and cover letter outlining their five years of experience in backend development.
Reviewed the candidate's profile and assigned the application to the Engineering cluster due to strong software development keywords and relevant experience.
Assigned recruiter John Smith to coordinate the interview process and follow up with the candidate regarding next steps in the hiring pipeline.
Conducted a phone screening where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software engineering principles and expressed enthusiasm for the devops practices used at our company.
Received an email from the candidate confirming availability for a technical interview and asking insightful questions about the engineering team's current projects.
Scheduled a technical interview for the candidate on May 10th with the senior developer team focusing on backend systems and devops pipelines.
